name: Thrown OverBoard
description:
You're shipwrecked! Explore the island, rescue your friends, then escape! Roll dice to move each day before returning to base camp.

  • Unveil the island as you explore
  • Rescue you friends by reaching and unlocking their cages
  • Land on action squares to gain resources
  • Upgrade your camp to gain more dice and rerolls
  • Cut down obstacles and enemies to find new paths and shortcuts
  • Collect 4 gears from wreckage to fix your ship and escape!
  • Collect 3 special fruits for a permanent dice bonus!

Everything was made from scratch by me in a frantic 48 hours. (thus no audio, sorry)

Don't feel pressured to play to the end, as I didn't have time to make a proper ending, but let me know how many in-game days it took if you do.

Thanks for playing!
-----------------------

-Rules-

  • Once you start moving you must finish you turn.
  • Turn ends when your dice count runs out or if you hit a dead end
  • Land on tiles with symbols to gain resources/perform actions
  • Once all players have moved, the day ends (then click the right menu) and all players return to camp.

-Controls- (Mouse and keyboard)

Left click:  select menu buttons
     -Select Character (Coloured symbols)
     -Upgrade camp/character (with req. materials)
     -Click dice to reroll (only while at camp)
Arrows keys/WASD : move around the island
Left click and drag to pan across the island. (This will unselect character)
Escape: Fullscreen
F5: Restart Game
R button : (In case of errors) Skip to next day

Having issues?
-If you are stuck and the day won't end you might be in camera mode, if so reselect the  character you were last.

-If you are still stuck, you can press R to end a day early (not intended gameplay, but you're welcome to use it freely)

-If you find any other bugs please let me know!

*KNOWN BUG*
Game will crash if you upgrade a character immediately after rescuing them-
FIX: Wait a day before upgrading and it should work fine.
